content.description: Python interpreter (2016 Fall, Final, Question 15 c)

p.line: Interpreter fun! For each, choose ONE that best matches what would display on the next line.
Note that some of the code might have bugs! We include “Error” and “None of these” in case the output is not what is expected.
_SPACE__GT__GT__GT__BOLDS__SPACE__SPACE_ "".join([word[0] for word in "Univ of Calif at Davis" if not(len(word) == 2)])_BOLDE_

content.hint: Try it out on your command line / terminal, using Python interpreter. Testing them from the inner part to the outer part.
